website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are an avid skater or are ready to upgrade to seriously fast rollerblades, this pair is built to impress.
pros: Outstanding construction and smooth-moving wheels earn these skates high marks from seasoned rollerbladers
Very speedy yet easy to control
cons: Sizes run on the small side for some customers
Somewhat stiff, requiring a break-in period for many wearers

customer_reviews.title: FAST!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife, she says she loves how they feel but beware the size of these wheels have some speed! She's an ok skater but says it's a bit scary going down hill because of how fast the puppies can go. NOT FOR BEGGINERS!!
customer_reviews.author: Malena Paz

customer_reviews.title: Love these skates
customer_reviews.text: For me they are true to size. I wear a shoe size 9 and ordered these in 9 as well and are a perfect fit for wearing thin socks. If you are the thick sock kinda person I would size a half size up. I took off the break which came off quite easy. Replaced the axels with a shorter one and got the perfect skates. They're very comfortable and I've done several pleasant rides.......many more will come.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: The best rollerblades.
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid rollerblader I’ve used many kinds and had my last pair for 5+ years. These are the best rollerblades I’ve ever used. Plus they have half sizes which is hard to come by. Super smooth ride, big, sturdy wheels. There is a little unnecessary piece of stretchy mesh with fishing twine in it across the tongue on the boot that I found made unlacing a bit difficult with my long nails so I clipped it out and that didn’t affect the blades in any way but definitely making them easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Cause HORRIBLE ankle and foot fatigue!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE! I rollerblade ALL THE TIME and have NEVER experienced ankle and foot fatigue. Within 2 min of wearing these had to turn around and come home!!!! They are AWFUL!!!! Worst blades I have EVER PUT ON MY FEET! The places that are padded on other blades DEFINITELY ARE NOT and the brake DO NOT WORK!!! Something is wrong with the angle of it! It Absolutely WILL NOT STOP YOU no matter how hard you push!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: These blades are totally awesome! I went from a pretty cheap recreational skate to this more advanced or intermediate fitness skate. I didn’t find them difficult to adjust to, although I have been skating on and off since I was a kid. I have a feeling I’ll be itching to upgrade to the 110 wheels soon enough but for where I am now, these are perfect and were fun and comfy right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Hm1117tx

customer_reviews.title: Love my new rollerblades
customer_reviews.text: I totally love my new rollerblades! They are very comfortable and are the fastest I ever had. I can now run faster than my friends riding bicycles:).
customer_reviews.author: april_fool

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife she likes them but says there is a spot on the top of the skate that hurts her legs. I read another review from someone that said the same thing. Just be aware these are nice skates but something at the top is uncomfortable and can create a sore on the leg.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: I followed their sizing guide and they fit me perfectly. They are pretty comfortable I like the look of these. Also the shipping was very quick, got them 4 days sooner than they estimated. Not bad having been shipped across the US during CORONA and demonstrations. Thank you inline warehouse!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Allan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth glide
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! I haven’t been on rollerblades in years and these are excellent even for beginners. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and definitely quick!
customer_reviews.text: I love my rollerblades. I did A LOT of research about the best brand/model before purchasing these. And I’m so glad I chose these. They are super easy to put on and definitely roll faster than smaller wheels. The ride is smooth and the boot itself supports the ankles well. It does have some ankle fatigue when first getting used to them, but I’ve adapted and now can blade for hours. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The skates are built extremely well. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter and she is loving them, they go really fast and the material is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in size
customer_reviews.text: Product looked great. I was very excited to get these as I use to rollerblade all the time. When I tried these on they run small in size. I need a larger size especially for around my legs. I had to return this. I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my rollerblades. I’m new to rollerblading, as I always roller skated. I really like the fact I can watch videos on how to learn to rollerblade. The rollerblades are durable and made of good quality. I like the fact that I can lace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these to upgrade my old ones and they're lightening fast!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Weippert

customer_reviews.title: Wear high thick socks everytime
customer_reviews.text: First of all I was annoyed that the wheels are not clear as pictured. Secondly the binding is so hard to tighten... lastly the interior of the skate has a strange design that rubs and punches mainly because the binding straps won’t get tight enough. I’ve had skates before but not $200 skates with lame bindings 😕 of course this all could have been avoided had I read the description (white wheels)typical amazon marketing... and wore thick high socks. Pros are They look pretty awesome and provide a fun and smooth ride
customer_reviews.author: Sandiest

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: True to size, great next level skates. Are better for uneven pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Feel like they are probably a very smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: True to size, (ordered a size up, and they are too big for me, but feel super smooth). Ordering a half size smaller, keeping fingers crossed on the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: These fit my daughter true to her shoe size. US6 women’s/5 kids. They look great and she is quite happy with them. Being real rollerblades I expect them to last her until she outgrows them and still have plenty of life for her younger siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7.5 to 8 and I can't even get my foot into the size 8. I guess I'll try ordering a size 10?
customer_reviews.author: Vanilla Mango

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollerblades. A lot. The wheels are bigger than I'm used to but they're amazing. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! 😍
customer_reviews.text: This roller skate are amazing, his color es fucsia not red. But are lovely. It speed very well and very fast. i recommend it for people who know skating because I think that it's not safe for starting. You should complete your order with something else for protection, like protective helmet, knee pad, knee pad, wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

product_meta.title: Rollerblade Macroblade 90 Alu Women's Adult Fitness Inline Skate, Black and Cherry, High Performance Inline Skates
product_meta.description: Macroblade 90 W is the quintessential model for someone looking to upgrade up from their older skates and wants to skate a little faster. 90mm is a great "go to" size for wheels and the fit and support of the Macroblade 90 is incredible. The higher boot design helps add more stability when learning to ride taller 90mm wheels thus creating a better sense of stability and control when skating. The overall support, speed and comfort has helped many skaters accelerate their abilities quickly. High end components, seamless uppers and a very secure closure system make this one of the best high quality fitness skates for someone serious about skating. Brake is on the skate.
feature_bullets: HIGH PERFORMANCE SKATES for the fitness enthusiast who wants a little more lateral support for stability while looking to train, exercise or skate faster.
LOWER CUFF FOR A PERFORMANCE SKATER This structure supports the abilities of all skaters comfortably. Ideal mix of flex and lateral support to enable longer skating sessions with less foot fatigue.
FORM FIT IS THE MOST COMFORTABLE INLINE LINER. The tongue and ankle areas consistently cushion the feet every skating session. Buckle, power strap and lace with lace lock closure secure the foot.
LOW PROFILE FRAME FOR 90MM WHEELS helps lower the center of gravity. 280mm/11" Cast aluminum frame is sturdy with a great strength to weight ratio. A good blend of speed and control.
SUPREME 90mm/85A WHEELS maximize roll, grip, speed and wear. A true upgrade in performance from entry level models. SG9 bearing spin is superior and helps provide the appropriate speed.
